title: Needing some rp to buy a sking from the snowdown shop
body:
Hi i have seen this being done here in there so i want to ask if its possible to get 30rp or 23rp so i could buy either dreadnova gp or night hunter rengar , both of witch are champs i play alot. i am at 652 rp atm so if it can be done i'll do anything (alomost).
rengar : https://imgur.com/a/Z04os

replies.body:
Oooooh dat kitty is cute as always! Be sure to double check your RP totals next time you login ^_^!!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
oh man i love youuuuu have great holidays and the best new year you are the best guys {{sticker:sg-lux}}
One of the popular ways of getting a little bit of RP is to draw a picture for them. Anything LoL related is fine, but it must be unique, not something copied and pasted off google.
well here is my attempt of drawing rengar :) https://imgur.com/a/Z04os

Now you just have to wait untill the poros are back and see this. They'll surely reward your efforts!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Did someone call a poro o_O

https://78.media.tumblr.com/667c4fc382ec836ba7c62817a90b1039/tumblr_o1gdd5uoWW1v6nwsxo1_500.gif
